Package io.atomix.core.election

Interface LeaderElection<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DistributedPrimitive, SyncPrimitive
    public interface LeaderElection<T>
extends SyncPrimitive
    LeaderElector provides the same functionality as AsyncLeaderElection with the only difference that all its methods block until the corresponding operation completes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitive

        DEFAULT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS

    • Method Detail

      • run

        Leadership<T> run​(T identifier)
        Attempts to become leader for a topic.
        Parameters:
        identifier - candidate identifier
        Returns:
        current Leadership state of the topic

      • withdraw

        void withdraw​(T identifier)
        Withdraws from leadership race for a topic.
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the node to withdraw

      • anoint

        boolean anoint​(T identifier)
        Attempts to promote a node to leadership displacing the current leader.
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the new leader
        Returns:
        true if leadership transfer was successfully executed; false if it failed. This operation can return false if the node to be made new leader is not registered to run for election for the topic.

      • promote

        boolean promote​(T identifier)
        Attempts to promote a node to top of candidate list.
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier of the new top candidate
        Returns:
        true if node is now the top candidate. This operation can fail (i.e. return false) if the node is not registered to run for election for the topic.

      • evict

        void evict​(T identifier)
        Attempts to evict a node from all leadership elections it is registered for.

        If the node the current leader for a topic, this call will force the next candidate (if one exists) to be promoted to leadership.

        Parameters:
        identifier - identifier

      • getLeadership

        Leadership<T> getLeadership()
        Returns the Leadership for the specified topic.
        Returns:
        current Leadership state of the topic

      • addListener

        void addListener​(LeadershipEventListener<T> listener)
        Registers a listener to be notified of Leadership changes for all topics.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to add

      • removeListener

        void removeListener​(LeadershipEventListener<T> listener)
        Unregisters a previously registered change notification listener.

        If the specified listener was not previously registered, this operation will be a noop.

        Parameters:
        listener - listener to remove

      • async

        AsyncLeaderElection<T> async()
        Description copied from interface: SyncPrimitive
        Returns the underlying asynchronous primitive.
        Specified by:
        async in interface SyncPrimitive
        Returns:
        the underlying asynchronous primitive
